strong a prop to support so weak a</Line>           <Line number="10">burden only, if your honour seem but pleased, I account</Line>           <Line number="11">myself highly praised, and vow to take advantage of all idle</Line>           <Line number="12">hours, till I have honoured you with some graver labour.
